citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:45am on
17-DEC-18.
-Contact was made with an individual by phone and it was relayed that no one would be available to walk the
inspector through the inspection process for the day.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:45am on
17-DEC-18.
-Contact was made with an individual by phone and it was relayed that no one would be available to walk the
inspector through the inspection process for the day.
